Title: Limits physician charges for missed appointments by patients
Summary: Relates to physician charges for missed appointments by patients; bars physicians from charging fees if a patient arrives on time for appointment but was not seen; requires written policy about missed appointments be prominently posted in patient waiting room and included in bills mailed to patients.
LawCode: Add ยง19-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to physician charges for missed appointments by patients
